thread.title: Legum & Norman Hires Nancy Kascak as Client Accounting Supervisor

author: cnbc.com
title: Legum & Norman Hires Nancy Kascak as Client Accounting Supervisor
text:
Falls Church, VA, May 18, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Legum & Norman , an Associa company, announces the recent hiring of Nancy Kascak as the new client accounting supervisor.
Ms. Kascak has more than 22 years of accounting experience and has held several positions including accounting manager, controller, chief operating officer, and accounting consultant. In her new position, Ms. Kascak will focus on expanding the financial needs of clients and identifying opportunities for process and procedure improvements.
“Nancy has an extensive accounting background and is a results-driven professional,” stated Marc McCoy, Legum & Norman president. “We are excited to have her on the team and see her experience, knowledge and proven track record make a positive contribution to our internal processes and procedures.”
Ms. Kascak holds a Bachelor of Science in Accounting from Shepherd University as well as a MBA in Finance and Management from Marymount University.
With more than 180 branch offices across North America, Associa delivers unsurpassed management and lifestyle services to nearly five million residents worldwide. Our 10,000+ team members lead the industry with unrivaled education, expertise and trailblazing innovation. For more than 40 years, Associa has provided solutions designed to help communities achieve their vision. To learn more, visit www.associaonline.com .
